Text:
The file plays in VLC Media Player but will not play on my WDTV Live. I tried converting it to a different format with a few video conversion programs, but none of them would open the source file. 

Even if you use VLC, you might be better off downloading the EZTV repack, which has better video quality and opens in every program I tried:
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7196995/South_Park_S16E06_REPACK_HDTV_x264-ASAP_%5Beztv%5D
@Tinny_pb: Do any of the programs you used provide a log? If so that could help in finding the reason for the failed import.

BigLtcs: Staxrip said "Indexing error: Can't open". AutoGK and ConvertXtoDVD (yeah, I even tried that) said "unknown file format". DivX Plus Converter failed with no error message or log.

Then I wised up and used VLC to successfully convert the file. (Duh.) The result plays fine on a WDTV Live.

Thanks for your response, and sorry for badmouthing your torrent. :)  A9 V7.

@Tinny_pb: Not a problem, I appreciate the feedback. And of course, sorry for the hassle.

If anyone else experiences a problem please let me know so that I can determine if it is an issue on my end and try to correct it. Thanks everybody!
